org.apromore.plugin

Interface PluginRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PluginRequestImpl

    public interface PluginRequest
    Common Request interface for all Plugins. The basic version just contains the user supplied request properties PropertyAwarePlugin for the current operation. Plugin APIs may extends this interface to provide advanced request parameter handling, when the built-in PluginPropertyType and RequestPropertyType mechanism does not work.
    Author:
    Felix Mannhardt (Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University oAS)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> PropertyType<T> getRequestProperty(PropertyType<T> pluginProperty)
      Get the current value for the given PropertyType in form of a PropertyType.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestProperty

        <T> PropertyType<T> getRequestProperty(PropertyType<T> pluginProperty)
                                   throws PluginPropertyNotFoundException
        Get the current value for the given PropertyType in form of a PropertyType. Please not the returned PropertyType will usually just holding the value, all other methods may just return NULL.
        Parameters:
        pluginProperty - that the Plugin defined
        Returns:
        PropertyType holding the request value
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyNotFoundException - if the property was not set and {link PropertyType.isMandatory() was true
